pages.title: Diamond
pages.text: Mining Level: Diamond (3) $(br2)Mining Speed: 8 $(br2)Base Durability: 1561 $(br2)Durability Multiplier: 1.3 $(br2)Attack Damage: +3

pages.title: Traits
pages.text: $(8)Mundane: $()$(br)The tool is typical and boring which discourages use. $(br2)$(8)Brittle: $()$(br)The tool is brittle and is not durable.
